quote: There is no religion without love, and people may talk as much as they like about their religion, but if it does not teach them to be good and kind to man and beast, it is all a sham.
quote_letters: THERE IS NO RELIGION WITHOUT LOVE AND PEOPLE MAY TALK AS MUCH AS THEY LIKE ABOUT THEIR RELIGION BUT IF IT DOES NOT TEACH THEM TO BE GOOD AND KIND TO MAN AND BEAST IT IS ALL A SHAM
